Operation 'getPointsOfInterest' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is action-oriented but lacks specificity. Description is completely missing, which severely impacts AI agent interpretability. Added details about input parameters (coordinates, radius), output format (Location collection), and use case context. Improved terminology consistency with API domain (Location schema, geographic coordinates).

data.current_summary: Returns points of interest for a given location and radius.
data.summary_suggestion: Search points of interest by location and radius
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a collection of points of interest (POIs) within a specified radius of a given geographic location. Accepts latitude and longitude coordinates as the center point and a radius parameter to define the search area. Returns a collection of Location objects containing POI details including name, type, geographic coordinates, and other relevant information. Useful for discovering attractions, landmarks, and amenities near a specific location.
data.reasoning: Original summary is action-oriented but lacks specificity. Description is completely missing, which severely impacts AI agent interpretability. Added details about input parameters (coordinates, radius), output format (Location collection), and use case context. Improved terminology consistency with API domain (Location schema, geographic coordinates).

message: Operation 'getPointsOfInterestBySquare' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary 'for a given area' is too vague and doesn't clarify the square/bounding box search method. Description is missing entirely. Added specificity about bounding box parameters, output format (Location collection), and differentiation from radius-based search. Improved AI agent interpretability by explaining when to use this operation versus the radius-based alternative.

data.current_summary: Returns points of interest for a given area
data.summary_suggestion: Search points of interest within a geographic square
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a collection of points of interest (POIs) within a specified geographic square area defined by bounding box coordinates (north, south, east, west latitude/longitude boundaries). Returns a collection of Location objects containing POI details. This operation is useful for discovering attractions and amenities within a rectangular geographic region, complementing the radius-based search. Accepts parameters to define the square boundaries and filter results.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'for a given area' is too vague and doesn't clarify the square/bounding box search method. Description is missing entirely. Added specificity about bounding box parameters, output format (Location collection), and differentiation from radius-based search. Improved AI agent interpretability by explaining when to use this operation versus the radius-based alternative.

message: Operation 'getPointOfInterest' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Original summary has a typo ('Retieve' should be 'Retrieve') and lacks clarity about the return value. Description is completely missing. Added details about the poisId parameter requirement, output format (Location object), and use case context. Improved action clarity and AI agent interpretability by explaining when and why to use this operation for fetching individual POI details.

data.current_summary: Retieve one point of interest by its Id.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific point of interest by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a single point of interest (POI) identified by its unique poisId. Returns a Location object containing comprehensive POI details including name, geographic coordinates, type, and other relevant attributes. This operation is used when you have a specific POI identifier and need to fetch its complete information. Requires a valid poisId parameter.
